name: Passwordless Authentication (FIDO)

settings.csp: worker-src 'self' blob:; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://code.jquery.com https://devsdk.singularkey.com http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';

nodeDescription.value: Initialize common values used in the flow so that they're easier to update in one place

customHTML.value:
Passwordless Authentication

In this PingOne DaVinci demo, we will guide you through a user authentication journey, without the need for passwords, utilizing the power of FIDO2.

nodeDescription.value: Form to get the user's username that they're trying to login with
Searches for the user in PingOne's cloud directory
Something went wrong when trying to find the user in PingOne matching the given username

customHTML.value:
<form
  id="webAuthnSupportForm"
  method="post"
>
  <input
    type="hidden"
    name="webAuthnSupport"
    id="webAuthnSupport"
  />
  <button
    type="hidden"
    data-skcomponent="skbutton"
    data-skbuttontype="form-submit"
    class="hidden-button"
    data-skbuttonvalue="submit"
    data-skform="webAuthnSupportForm"
    id="webAuthnSupportSubmitBtn"
  ></button>
</form>
